name: Akuma
quote: My skills are unparalleled!

moves.name: Zugaihasatsu
moves.notes: Only ground bounces on airborne opponents

moves.name: Zanku Hadoken L
moves.notes: Add 6 frames of ground recovery if Akuma lands during recovery frames, Projectile - 5 low durability points

moves.name: Zanku Hadoken M
moves.notes: Add 6 frames of ground recovery if Akuma lands during recovery frames, Projectile - 5 low durability points

moves.name: Zanku Hadoken H
moves.notes: Add 6 frames of ground recovery if Akuma lands during recovery frames, Projectile - 5 low durability points

moves.name: Goshoryuken L
moves.notes: Airborne from frame 7, Invincible from frames 1 - 6

moves.name: Goshoryuken M
moves.notes: Airborne from frame 5, Invincible from frames 1 - 7

moves.name: Goshoryuken H
moves.notes: Airborne from frame 5, Invincible from frames 1 - 10

moves.name: Hyakkishu L
moves.notes: Airborne frame 1, Follow up attacks can be done from frame 14 and onward

moves.name: Hyakkishu M
moves.notes: Airborne frame 1, Follow up attacks can be done from frame 14 and onward

moves.name: Hyakkishu H
moves.notes: Airborne frame 1, Follow up attacks can be done from frame 14 and onward

moves.name: Hyakki Goho
moves.notes: Auto aligns with opponent, Projectile - 5 low durability points

moves.name: Tenma-Gozanku Agyo
moves.notes: Each projectile has 5 high durability points

moves.name: Raging Demon
moves.attributes: Full Invincibility, Hard Knockdown, Mashable, Level 3 Super

assists.name: Tastumaki Zankyaku M
assists.notes: Nullifies low and medium priority projectiles during active frames

name: Amaterasu
quote: No time to lick your wounds, Ammy. We have to find Orochi!
airDashNotes: Forward air dash movement starts on the 13th frame.

name: Arthur
quote: You have the air... of a demon!

name: C. Viper
quote: I don't do overtime. And I don't particularly like rematches, either. So would you mind accepting your loss and going home?
airDashNotes: Diagonal air dash movement starts on frame 9.

name: Captain America
quote: I consider it my duty and an honor to fight for justice!

name: Chris
quote: I'll root out bio-terrorists wherever they may hide!

name: Chun Li
quote: You can't beat me with just brute strength. Go ahead and try.
jumpNotes: Chun Li can also wall jump.
airDashNotes: Chun Li's forward air dash travels at a sligh downward angle.

name: Dante
quote: Demons, superhumans. Meh. Same crap, different day.
jumpNotes: Triple jump only available in Devil Trigger.
airDashNotes: Double air dash only available in Devil Trigger.

name: Deadpool
quote: Do I kill you with the sleek but impersonal firearm, or go with the cool factor of a nice katana?

name: Doctor Doom
quote: No one defeats Doom!
groundDashNotes: Doctor Doom cannot cancel his dash into normals, specials, or supers.

name: Doctor Strange
quote: One does not require the Eye of Agamotto to see this outcome.

name: Dormammu
quote: Who dares defy the dread lord?
groundDashNotes: Dormammu cannot cancel his dash into normals, specials, or supers.
airDashNotes: Down Back air dash movement starts on frame 6.

name: Felicia
quote: I'm Felicia, the most dancingist, singingist woman you'll ever meet!

name: Firebrand
quote: This time, it's you that'll turn into a pile of bones!

name: Frank West
quote: What do you mean I don't belong here? I've covered wars, y'know.

name: Ghost Rider
quote: I would pray now. A lot.

name: Haggar
quote: It's my job to keep Metro City safe!

name: Hawkeye
quote: World's great marksman, at your service.

name: Hsien-Ko
quote: What else do I have up my sleevs? Nuh-uh! A girl's gotta keep her secrets, y'know!
groundDashNotes: Forward dash is invincible frame 16 - 30 and can pass through opponents.

name: Hulk
quote: Hulk smash! Hulk win! Hulk the strongest!
groundDashNotes: Hulk cannot cancel his dash into normals, specials, or supers.

name: Iron Fist
quote: The scribes in K'un-Lun will write of this battle for years to come.
jumpNotes: Iron Fist can also wall jump.

name: Iron Man
quote: I don't think I'm always right. I know it.
airDashNotes: Diagonal and lateral airdash movement starts on frame 10. Up and down air dashes move instantly but hover at the end.

name: Jill
quote: Chris... Raccoon City... S.T.A.R.S... What are these memories?

name: M.O.D.O.K
quote: They once called me M.O.D.O.C But I'd much rather be "killing" than "computing!"
jumpNotes: Normal jumping puts M.O.D.O.K in flight mode on frame 5.

name: Magneto
quote: The time for subtlety is passing. Now is the time for change.
airDashNotes: Down back air dash movement starts on frame 6.

name: Morrigan
quote: Trust me, I'm not as delicate as I might look. I might be the one who ends up breaking you in half.
groundDashNotes: Morrigan air dashes instead of ground dashes at an angle. Hold the input to dash for longer. Morrigan can cancel her forward dash into an air attack after frame 15. Her backdash cannot be canceled.
airDashNotes: Up air dash swoops Morrigan in a vertical arc forward. Down air dash swoops Morrigan forward in a downward-dipping parabola.

name: Nemesis
quote: STAAAARS!

name: Nova
quote: I'm the only guardian the galaxy needs.
airDashNotes: Forward and back air dash movement starts on frame 6. Diagonal air dash movement start on frame 9.

name: Phoenix
quote: I'm scared ...there's a voice inside that's pushing me to kill, to destroy everything...!

name: Phoenix Wright
quote: Heroes, villains, and this huge Galactus guy trying to take over... It's like something out of Maya's favorite show!

name: Rocket Raccoon
quote: The raccoon's the king of the beasts. Screw the lion.
jumpNotes: Holding up during jump allows Rocket Raccoon to float.

name: Ryu
quote: Dedicate yourself, and anything is possible! Human potential is truly limitless...

name: Sentinel
quote: The programming of this nit is evolving. Changing. Adapting. Becoming... Bastion.

name: She-Hulk
quote: How many ladies made the cut for both the Avengers and the Fantastic Four? You're looking at her.

name: Shuma-Gorath
quote: I am he who sleeps but now awakens!
groundDashNotes: Shuma-Gorath's backdash is invincible from frames 12 - 31.

name: Spider-Man
quote: Sometimes with great power comes the great responsibility to beat the beejezus out of somebody.
airDashNotes: Forward air dash movement starts on frame 6.

name: Spencer
quote: Either you die a hero, or live long enough to have everyone turn on you.

name: Storm
quote: I will not lose so long as the rains and the winds are mine to command!
jumpNotes: Holding up during jump allows Storm to float.

name: Strider Hiryu
quote: Unless you're a target of mine, you will never see me. If you do see me, then it's already too late.
jumpNotes: Strider Hiryu can also wall jump.

name: Super-Skrull
quote: Yes, I fought for humanity during Secret Invasion. But don't read too much into that.

name: Taskmaster
quote: I can use Captain America's shield, fight like Iron Fise, and move like Daredevil. Simply put, I'm awesome.

name: Thor
quote: It is said one day my life shall be claimed by Ragnarok. Today is not that day.

name: Trish
quote: Yeah, I'm actually a demon spawn from hell. But I'm actually not a bad girl when you get to know me.

name: Tron Bonne
quote: If it's not nailed down, it's mine!

name: Vergil
quote: Power... I need more power...
jumpNotes: Double jump only available in Devil Trigger mode.
airDashNotes: Gains 2-Way air dash in Devil Trigger mode.

name: Viewtiful Joe
quote: Henshin-a-go-go, baby!
airDashNotes: Viewtiful Joe can air dash twice.

name: Wesker
quote: This world shall be mine.

name: Wolverine
quote: You wanna try your luck against the Wolverine?

name: X-23
quote: I... I am not a weapon!

name: Zero
quote: You can't even lay a single scratch on me. Move on before you get hurt.
airDashNotes: Air dash movement starts on frame 9.
